response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, it's valued at $12,000 to me. Considering its worth to you, I'm offering it to you at $11,000. This represents a substantial saving for you while ensuring a fair return for us. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations.", "product_price": 11000}
